constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 95 (Tuesday, June 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MALLIOTAKIS:
H.R. 3666.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 17 grants Congress the power
to exercise exclusive legislation pertaining to '' other
needful Buildings'' owned by the United States.
[Page H2686]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: Stars and Stripes Act of 2021
